document_data.mainbody: '''Algarzel Halfcloak''' was a [[mage]] in the early-to-midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Algarzel Halfcloak fought [[Kluennh Tzarr]] in a [[spell]]-battle around {{yearlink|1346}}.<ref group="note">This is eleven years before {{yearlink|1357}}. He avoided a [[fireball]] that struck a ferry in a nearby river, killing everyone in it. The only survivor from the ferry was [[Narm Tamaraith]], who was hurled into the water by his father moments before the explosion. Algarzel ultimately was defeated in that spell-battle.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Though he was never seen again after the battle, there were reports he might have not perished, but fled elsewhere, perhaps to another plane.
